attributes.action: Make 21 and 22 of June bank holidays so everyone can recover from the last year
attributes.background: Make the reopening official bank holidays

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205

Make June 22nd (or the day after Nightclubs reopen) a bank holiday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576510

Make June 23rd a bank holiday to celebrate UK Independence Day: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564905
